content: **crocheted jacket in drops cotton light the piece is worked top down with raglan and stripes sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #lovestripescardigan drops design pattern cluster-143 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-350-350-400-450-500 g colour 21 light beige 350-350-400-450-450-500 g colour 47 crimson red **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **buttons ** drops buttons no 712 6-6-6-6-7-7 items **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height with hook size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
